info.title: Bank Card Contract
info.description:
A Bank Card Contract is a contract between a financial institution and customer that is based on the customer’s request to have a bank card issued and consists, amongst other things, of the bank card type, the cardholder, and the general terms and conditions.					

Remark:
The service Bank Card Contract is assigned to service group Transactional Banking.

x-sap-shortText: Read, create, and query bank card contracts using this synchronous inbound service

get.description: A request to query bank card contracts

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionfilter)

Required filter properties:
- CardHolderPartyIdentifyingElements

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

post.description: A request to create a bank card contract

parameters.name: BankCardContractUUID
parameters.description:
A BankCardContractUUID is an universal unique identifier of a bank card contract.  
GDT: NOSC_UUID

get.summary: Read Bank Card Contract by UUID
get.description: A request to read a bank card contract by UUID

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET BankCardContracts HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

BankCardContractUUID.title: A BankCardContractUUID is an universal unique identifier of a bank card contract.

ID.title: An identifier of a bank card contract.

CurrencyCode.title: A CurrencyCode specifies the currency of the bank card contract.

PaymentCardTypeCode.title: A coded representation of the type of payment card associated to a bank card contract.

PaymentCardID.title: PaymentCardID is a unique identifier of a payment card that is assigned by the issuer of the payment card.

PaymentCardSequenceID.title: An identifier for the sequence number of a payment card.

PaymentCardValidFrom.title: The valid-from date of the payment card.

PaymentCardValidTo.title: The valid-to date of the payment card.

PaymentCardCharacterCode.title: A coded representation for the character of a payment card associated to a bank card contract.

FirstPaymentCardUUID.title: The UUID of the payment card, which has PaymentCardOriginCode = First Card

AdditionalPaymentCardIndicator.title: Indicates that the payment card is an additional payment card to the main payment card.

PaymentCardLifeCycleStatusCode.title: A coded representation of the life cycle status of a bank card contract payment card.

PaymentCardRenewalStatusCode.title: A coded representation for the renewal status of a payment card associated to a bank card contract.

CancellationDate.title: Date when a bank card contract is canceled.

BankAccount.title: BankAccount is the main bank account to which payments and charges in context with using the payment card are settled.

UsageNote.title: A comment on the usage of the bank card contract.

SystemAdministrativeData.title: SystemAdministrativeData is administrative data that is stored in a system. This data includes change dates and change times.

CardHolderPartyIdentifyingElements.title: A party which legally holds a card associated with the bank card contract.

ProductControl.title: A BankCardContractProductionControl defines the parameters that control the processing and handling in the production of a bank card contract.

OperationalBankContractManagement.title: An OperationalBankContractManagement is responsible for managing operational bank contracts and executing the related banking processes.

BusinessProcessChainAssignment.title: Business Process Chain Assignment is the assignment of a business object node to a business process chain.

ChangeStateID.title: A ChangeStateID is a unique identifier for a change state.

RoutingID.title: Number of the bank in a clearing system (see GDT BankRoutingID).

CountryCode.title: Country in which the bank identified earlier goes about its business. If the bank is a member in a national clearing system, the country to which this clearing system belongs is entered here. Constraint: Only listID 3166-1 of listAgencyID 5 will be supported.

ID.title: Bank account number (Basic Bank Account Number, BBAN). An account number that is assigned by the account managing bank. It uniquely identifies a bank account in most countries only together with the bank.

InternalID.title: BankAccountInternalID is a proprietary identifier for a bank account.

UUID.title: A UUID is an universal unique identifier of a bank account.

CurrencyCode.title: CurrencyCode is a coded representation of the currency of the bank account.

Bank.title: Bank where the account is held.

ID.title: A unique identifier of an organizational unit that is responsible for managing operational bank contracts and executing the related banking processes.
ID.description:
Constraint: The ID may not exceed the length of 8 and may only consist of numerical characters.
GDT: OrganisationalCentreID

PartyUUID.title: The UUID of a party (business partner).
PartyUUID.description:
Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator. Only one filter value for PartyUUID can be specified. If filter value for PartyUUID is specified, additional filtering for PartyID or AlternativePartyID is not possible. 
GDT: UUID

PartyID.title: The ID of a party (business partner).
PartyID.description:
Filter: Only 'Eq' is supported as logical operator. Only one filter value for PartyID can be specified. If filter value for PartyID is specified, additional filtering for PartyUUID or AlternativePartyID is not possible. 
GDT: PartyID

com.sap.gateway.default.bankcardcontract.title: Party Identifying Elements
com.sap.gateway.default.bankcardcontract.description:
PartyIdentifyingElements does contain all identifying elements of a party (business partner).  
Remark:  PartyTypeCode is value 147 (Business Partner). 
Integrity Condition: Either PartyUUID or PartyID or PartyAlternativeIdentification must be specified.
